scripts.build:server:post: rm -rf packages/server/res && mkdir -p  packages/server/res && cp -r node_modules/@sockethub/examples/build packages/server/res/examples && cp node_modules/@sockethub/client/dist/* packages/server/res/ && cp node_modules/socket.io/client-dist/socket.io.js packages/server/res/socket.io.js
scripts.clean:deps: bun run --parallel -r clean:deps && npx rimraf node_modules
scripts.compliance: bun lint && bun build && bun test
scripts.docker:start: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up prosody sockethub -d
scripts.docker:clean:all: bun docker:stop && docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1 sockethub-redis-1 sockethub-prosody-1; docker rmi sockethub_sockethub
scripts.docker:clean:sockethub: bun docker:stop && docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1; docker rmi sockethub-sockethub
scripts.integration:browser: bun docker:start && bun integration:browser:run; RES=$?; exit $RES
scripts.integration:redis: docker compose up redis -d && bun integration:redis:run; RES=$?; docker compose down; exit $RES
scripts.lint: prettier --check . && eslint --max-warnings 0 . && NX_NATIVE_COMMAND_RUNNER=false nx run-many --target=lint && bun lint:doc
scripts.publish: bun clean && bun build && bun compliance && lerna publish --dist-tag latest --pre-dist-tag next
